/* kr.fingate.gs.auth.hstry.dao.HstryDao.getRoleHstryList */ SELECT RH.HSTRY_SEQ , RH.ATRBT_NAME , RH.ORGNL_VALUE , RH.CHANGE_VALUE , RH.OPRTN_TYPE , CONCAT(U.USER_NAME, '(', O.ORGNZ_NAME, ')') AS REG_USER_NAME , DATE_FORMAT(RH.REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE FROM GA_ROLE_HSTRY RH LEFT JOIN GA_USER U ON RH.REG_USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT JOIN GA_OGNI O ON U.ORGNZ_NO = O.ORGNZ_NO
ORDER BY RH.REG_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(CNT.HIST_SEQ) FROM ( SELECT RH.HSTRY_SEQ FROM GA_ROLE_HSTRY RH INNER JOIN GA_ROLE R ON RH.ENTTY_KEY2 = R.ROLE_NO
) CNT

/* kr.fingate.gs.auth.hstry.dao.UserRoleHstryDao.getUserRoleHstryList*/ SELECT 'I' AS ROLE_TYPE , R.ROLE_NAME
, RH.ATRBT_NAME , RH.ORGNL_DATA , RH.CHANGE_DATA
, RH.REASON_NO , RS.REASON_CODE , RS.REASON_TYPE , RS.REASON , DATE_FORMAT(RH.REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE , CONCAT(UG.USER_NAME, '(', OG.ORGNZ_NAME, ')') AS REG_USER_NAME FROM GA_ROLE_HSTRY RH INNER JOIN GA_ROLE R ON RH.ENTTY_KEY2 = R.ROLE_NO INNER JOIN GA_ROLE_REASON RS ON RH.REASON_NO = RS.REASON_NO LEFT JOIN GA_USER UG ON RH.REG_USER_NO = UG.USER_NO LEFT JOIN GA_ORGNZ OG ON UG.ORGNZ_NO = OG.ORGNZ_NO
ORDER BY RH.REASON_NO DESC, RH.REG_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(CNT.HIST_SEQ) FROM ( SELECT RH.HSTRY_SEQ FROM GA_ROLE_HSTRY RH INNER JOIN GA_ROLE_GROUP RG ON RH.ENTTY_KEY2 = RG.ROLE_GROUP_NO
) CNT

/* kr.fingate.gs.auth.hstry.dao.UserRoleHstryDao.getUserRoleGroupHstryList */ SELECT 'G' AS ROLE_TYPE
, RG.ROLE_GROUP_NAME , RH.ATRBT_NAME , RH.ORGNL_DATA , RH.CHANGE_DATA
, RH.REASON_NO , RS.REASON_CODE , RS.REASON_TYPE , RS.REASON
, DATE_FORMAT(RH.REG_DATE, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') AS REG_DATE , CONCAT(UG.USER_NAME, '(', OG.ORGN_NAME, ')') AS REG_USER_NAME FROM GA_ROLE_HSTRY RH INNER JOIN GA_ROLE_GROUP RG ON RH.ENTTY_KEY2 = RG.ROLE_GROUP_NO INNER JOIN GA_ROLE_REASON RS ON RH.REASON_NO = RS.REASON_NO LEFT JOIN GA_USER UG ON RH.REG_USER_NO = UG.USER_NO LEFT JOIN GA_ORGNZ OG ON UG.ORGNZ_NO = OG.ORGNZ_NO
ORDER BY RH.REASON_NO DESC, RH.REG_DATE DESC
